scripts.database:update: pnpm database:clean && pnpm database:crawl && pnpm database:build
scripts.messages:update: pnpm messages:extract && pnpm messages:combine && pnpm messages:clean
scripts.assets:build: cp -r assets/* dist/ && svgo --recursive --quiet -f assets/ -o dist/
scripts.messages:watch: nodemon --watch i18n --ext po --exec 'pnpm messages:build && pnpm pug:build'
scripts.watch: concurrently npm:pug:watch npm:livescript:watch npm:assets:watch npm:stylus:watch npm:messages:watch'
scripts.dev: pnpm configure:dev && nodemon --watch hydrator --ext go --exec 'pnpm hydrator:build && pnpm watch
scripts.database:clean: mv -t ./ database/.portfoliodb.yaml database/.lastbuild.yaml database/sites.json database/database.json && rm -r database/ && mkdir database && mv -t database/ sites.json .portfoliodb.yaml database.json .lastbuild.yaml
scripts.clean: pnpm messages:clean && pnpm database:clean && rm -r dist
